alert.note: Alert for Giles; Lawrence; Wayne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 7:25PM CDT until August 05 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wayne County in Middle Tennessee... Southern Lawrence County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Giles County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 724 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Loretto, or 16 miles north of Florence, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Loretto, St. Joseph, Minor Hill, Leoma, Westpoint and Iron City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
